The Best Beers to Pair With Shellfish Forget the Muscadet. A new wave of easy-drinking sour beer is the on-point pairing for seafood By William Bostwick Updated Feb. 21, 2017 11:06 a.m. ET 
WITH SEAFOOD, basic is usually best: a fresh catch wearing only grill marks, an oyster just out of the water, lightly dressed or bare naked. So when Delaware-based brewer Sam Calagione, founder of Dogfish Head, planned the beer menu at his year-old seafood restaurant, Chesapeake & Maine, in Rehoboth Beach, he faced a pairing paradox: “How simple can we go in the food and how light-but-complex can we go in the beer?”
